titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 3-(Ethylsulfonyl)-2-pyridinesulfonamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 3-(Ethylsulfonyl)-2-pyridinesulfonamide.
